# IPC Shalom Assembly Website Project

## Project Status
- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Install Required Extensions
- [x] Compile the Project
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [ ] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Details
- **Project Name**: IPC Shalom Assembly Website
- **Framework**: Next.js 15
- **Styling**: Bootstrap 5 with React Bootstrap
- **SEO**: Optimized with metadata in layout
- **Type**: Church website with multiple pages (Home, About, Connect, Sermons, Give, Visit)

## Development
Run `npm run dev` to start the development server at http://localhost:3000
